name: Neon Farmer Bros
description:
Use your puzzle skills to control 2 farmers and grow crops with the aid of neon light blocks.

Controls:

  • Move character with WASD or Arrow Keys
  • Space Key switches characters
  • U = Undo move
  • R = Restart level

Rules:

  • Crops grow to full size after 2 passes of the neon light (more than 2 passes will cause the crops to burn up)
  • Stepping or pushing a block on to crops will cause them to get crushed
  • Return to markers after all crops have grown to full size, to complete the level
